title: Charging connected device via USB?
content: I have tried resetting the phone and swiping to remove the notification.  For some reason I'm not connected to any device or USB but the notification keeps popping up for the past few days.  I feel like it's starting to pop up even more.  I just got the phone in June or July.  I'm not sure what could be wrong.  When I click on the tab that pops up on the screen the following is what shows up
